title: EBusiness Suite
extract: Oracle's E-Business Suite (also known as Applications/Apps, EB-Suite/EBS, or "E-Biz") consists of a collection of enterprise resource planning (ERP), customer relationship management (CRM), and supply-chain management (SCM) computer applications either developed or acquired by Oracle.
extract_html: Oracle's E-Business Suite (also known as Applications/Apps, EB-Suite/EBS, or "E-Biz") consists of a collection of enterprise resource planning (ERP), customer relationship management (CRM), and supply-chain management (SCM) computer applications either developed or acquired by Oracle.
